mapper.select: select uc.user_id userOrGroupId, ui.nick_name userOrGroupName from r_chat.user_contact uc join r_chat.user_info ui on uc.user_id = ui.user_id where uc.contact_id = #{groupId} order by uc.create_time

select uc.contact_id userOrGroupId, ui.nick_name userOrGroupName from r_chat.user_contact uc join r_chat.user_info ui on uc.contact_id = ui.user_id where uc.user_id = #{userId} and uc.status in (1, 3, 5) order by ui.nick_name

select uc.contact_id userOrGroupId, gi.group_name userOrGroupName from r_chat.user_contact uc join r_chat.group_info gi on uc.contact_id = gi.group_id where uc.user_id = #{userId} and uc.status in (1, 3, 5) and gi.group_owner_id != #{userId} order by gi.group_name
